title: Amazon API Gateway - AWS Lambda - Amazon Comprehend sentiment analysis
description: Perform sentiment analysis using Amazon Comprehend through AWS Lambda and Amazon API Gateway

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This patterns shows a CDK deployment on how to use Amazon API Gateway, AWS Lambda, and Amazon Comprehend to perform sentiment analysis in a serverless fashion.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Arjun Arippa
authors.bio: Arjun Arippa is a Solutions Architect based in Bangalore, India. He works with some of the strategic and global customers in India, to build and architect their applications on AWS.
